name: Chance-o-mancy
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

CONTROLS
  • WASD to move
  • 1,2,3,4,5 to choose d4, d6, d8, d12, d20 dice, respectively
  • LMB to throw the selected dice
  • Dice deal damage on impact equal to what they roll. In addition, they have additional effects based on its element,
ELEMENTS

Effects other than Fire don't stack.

Fire
  • Explodes on impact, applying a damage over time to all nearby enemies. Radius and damage per tick increases based on roll. Stacks.
Earth
  • Pushes enemies back, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. Knock back force increases based on roll. 
Air
  • Creates a zone around the enemy that doubles your movement speed.  Radius increases based on roll. Lingers after target dies. 
Astral
  • Creates a zone around the enemy that doubles their damage taken from all sources.  Radius increases based on roll. Lingers after target dies. 
Water
  • Applies a slow to all enemies in a radius. Radius increases based on roll.

Music: Thermal by Context Sensitive
